name: Rand-o-pocalypse
description:
Created in Construct 3 on iOS, untested on PC however based on previous games made similarly it should all be properly in order. 

Rand-o-pocolypse is a Post-Apocalyptic Endless Adventure where you never know what will come next! If you’ve got the gallstones come and give it a try. But for real I hope you have fun.

Controls

Press/Click “Jump” button to jump

Press/Click “Crosshairs” button to use weapons

Created in Construct 3

Music By Listener Records

Sound Design/Foley Art by Listener Records & downloaded from Zapsplat.com
